attributes.action: Invite international observers to be present at  all UK elections and referendum
attributes.additional_details:
2016 many UK citizens abroad disenfranchised 
2019 many EU citizens in UK turned away at polling station
attributes.background:
Public confidence on the fairness of elections and referendums is damaged. 
2016 electoral commission found illegal funding of leave campaign and there is an NCA investigation
